snippet: San Antonio's victory over Miami in Game 4 of the NBA Finals on Thursday night drew an average television audience of 14,964,000 viewers and a 9.3 national rating on ABC....

headline.print_headline: Game 4 of NBA Finals Draws 9.3 Rating on ABC
headline.main: Game 4 of NBA Finals Draws 9.3 Rating on ABC

lead_paragraph: San Antonio's victory over Miami in Game 4 of the NBA Finals on Thursday night drew an average television audience of 14,964,000 viewers and a 9.3 national rating on ABC.
